transcript mlt.Title: Il-popolazzjoni tiżdied b’25% fl-aħħar 10 snin għal 519,562

Transcript.text: Hekk kif dalgħodu l-Uffiċċju Nazzjonali tal-Istatistika ppubblika r-riżultati taċ-ċensiment 2022 jirriżulta li l-popolazzjoni f’Malta kibret bi kważi kwart fl-aħħar 10 snin u llum tgħodd 519,562.

Jirriżulta wkoll li f’Malta hawn aktar irġiel milli nisa għal kuntrarju ta’ dak li storikament kien gie rreġistrat fil-passat hekk kif iċ-ċensiment ta’ qabel kien juri li hawn ferm aktar nisa mill-irġiel.

Minn dan iċ-ċensiment joħroġ ukoll li mhux talli Malta huwa l-aktar pajjiż b’densità għolja fl-UE iżda kompliet tiżdied tant li hawn 1,649 persuna għal kull kilometru kwadru. Il-medja Ewropea hija ta’ 109 kull kilometru kwadru.

Iċ-ċensiment juri li waqt li qabel kienet l-Isla l-aktar post fl-Ewropa fejn hemm nies għad-daqs tal-post issa hija Tas-Sliema li telgħet fil-quċċata b’aktar minn 15,000 persuna għal kull kilometru kwadru.
L-akbar lokalità issa hija San Pawl il-Baħar b’32,042 resident meta fl-2005 kienet fil-5 post u fl-2011 fit-3. Wara San Pawl il-Baħar jiġu Birkirkara u l-Mosta.

Miċ-ċensiment joħroġ ukoll aktar minn wieħed minn kull ħames persuni f’Malta huma barannin. Fil-pajjiż hawn 115,449 barrani, ħames darbiet iċ-ċifra rreġistrata fl-2019, bil-maġġoranza jgħixu fit-Tramuntana u fit-Tramuntana tal-Port il-Kbir.

transcript eng.Title: Population increases by 25% over last 10 years to 519,562

Transcript.text: This morning the National Office of Statistics published the results of the Census 2022, which shows that the population in Malta has grown by almost one-fourth in the last ten years and today the population stands at 519,562.
In Malta there are more men than women, contrary to what was historically registered in the past as the previous census showed that there are more women than men.

From this census it emerges that Malta is not only the country with the densest population in the EU but has continued to increase so much that there are now 1,649 people for every kilometre squared. The European average is of 109 every km squared.
The census shows that while before L-Isla had the highest density in Europe, now the densest place is Sliema with more than 15,000 people per km squared.
The largest locality is St Paul’s Bay with 32,042 residents while in 2006 it was in fifth place and in 2011 it was in third place. The most populated places after St Paul’s Bay are B’Kara and Mosta.

More than one in five people in Malta are of foreign nationality. There are115,449 foreigners, five times more than the figure registered in 2019, with the majority living in the North and Northern Harbour region.

transcript mlt.Title: ARA: Tlieta evakwati minn fuq jott li nqered bin-nirien ħdejn Kemmuna

Transcript.text: Tliet persuna ġew salvati wara li l-jott li kienu fuqu ħa n-nar ħdejn Kemmuna.
L-inċident seħħ matul dan il-lejl viċin il-bajja ta’ Santa Marija.
Minn informazzjoni li għandu TVMnews.mt jirriżulta li l-jott fih madwar 80 pied.
It-3 persuni li kienu fuq id-dgħajsa tniżżlu fuq dinghy waqt li nies fil-qrib ukoll taw l-għajnuna.
In-nirien intfew mill-pumpieri tad-Dipartiment tal-Protezzjoni Ċivili b’dinghy apposta.
Kelliem għall-Pulizija qalilna li ħadd minnhom ma weġġa’ għalkemm kellhom xokk fuqhom.

transcript eng.Title: WATCH: Three people evacuated from yacht which was destroyed by fire near Comino

Transcript.text: Three people were rescued after the yacht caught fire near Comino
The accident happened last night near Santa Maria bay.
From information obtained by TVMnews.mt it results that this was an 80 foot yacht.
The three people on the yacht were taken on a dinghy while people nearby also called for help.
The fire was put out by firemen from the Department of Civil Protection using a special dinghy.
A Police spokesman said that no one was injured although they were suffering from shock.
Ħalla l-Ukrajna, mindu sar il-ftehim mar-Russja, l-ewwel vapur mimli qamħarrun.
Il-vapur, bl-isem “Razoni”, sejjer lejn il-Libanu b’26,000 tunellata qamħarrun.
Qabel jasal il-Libanu l-vapur se jiġi spezzjonat fit-Turkija għada t-Tlieta.
Ir-Russja kienet ilha timblokka l-portijiet Ukreni minn Frar li għadda.
L-Ukrajna hija waħda mill-ikbar produtturi u esportaturi ta’ qamħ fid-dinja.
It-Turkija kienet il-medjatur ewlieni biex l-Ukrajna u r-Russja waslu għal dan il-ftehim.
Il-ftehim huwa għal 120 jum u fih kienet involuta wkoll in-Nazzjonijiet Maqgħuda.
Il-pajjiż madwar l-Ewropa u d-dinja qed jittamaw li l-ftehim iwassal għal roħs fil-prezz tal-ikel.

transcript eng.Title: Grain ship leaves Ukraine Port for the first time since Russian invasion

Transcript.text: A grain ship has left Ukraine for the first time, since the Russian invasion following an agreement with Russian.
The ship, “Razoni”, is on its way to Tripoli via Lebanon with 26,000 metric tons of corn.
Before arriving in Lebanon the ship will be inspected in Turkey tomorrow – Tuesday.
Russia had been blockading Ukrainian ports since last February.
Ukraine is one of the largest producers and exporters of wheat worldwide.
Turkey was the main mediator for Ukraine and Russia to reach this agreement.
The agreement is for 120 days and the United Nations was also involved.
Countries in Europe and all over the world are hoping that the agreement will lead to a reduction in the price of food.

transcript mlt.Title: Melvin Theuma jgħid li għadda flus lil Mario Degiorgio għax kien rikattat

Transcript.text: Melvin Theuma qal li għadda l-flus lil Mario Degiorgio biex jgħaddihom lil ħutu George u Alfred Degiorgio fil-ħabs għax ħassu mhedded.
Theuma kien qed jixhed quddiem il-Maġistrat Donatella Frendo Dimech hekk kif din bdiet tisma’ l-kumpilazzjoni ta’ Mario Degiorgio li jinsab mixli b’ħasil ta’ flus u rikatt.
Degiorgio huwa ħu ż-żewġt irġiel li jinsabu mixlijin bil-qtil ta’ Daphne Caruana Galizia u bħalissa jinsab il-ħabs fejn hemm ukoll l-istess ħutu.

Theuma ngħata maħfra presidenzjali b’rabta ma’ dan il-qtil li dwaru hemm akkużat b’kompliċità Yorgen Fenech waqt li Vince Muscat qed jiskonta piena ta’ 15-il sena ħabs wara li ammetta l-involviment fil-qtil.
Fix-xhieda tiegħu llum Theuma sostna li huwa qatt ma qal lil Mario Degiorgio li kien il-middleman fil-qtil ta’ Caruana Galizia u qatt ma semma lil Yorgen Fenech.

Huwa qal li Mario Degiorgio kien jitolbu l-flus biex jitħallsu spejjeż ta’ George Degiorgio fosthom dak tal-iskola tat-tfal u kien jiltaqa’ mal-akkużat f’karozza fil-Marsa jew fid-dar tal-istess Mario Degiorgio fl-istess lokalità.
Theuma qal li ġieli għadda madwar €200 fil-ġimgħa minn butu lill-aħwa George u Alfred Degiorgio barra l-€2,500 li tah Yorgen Fenech għalihom.
Huwa żied li Mario Degiorgio kien jgħaddilu irċevuti maħruġa mill-Faċilità Korrettiva ta’ Kordin li wħud minnhom kien jgħaddihom lil Yorgen Fenech bħala prova li għaddew il-flus.

Theuma sostna li George Degiorgio kien jgħidlu biex jibża’ min-nies ta’ ġewwa mhux dawk ta’ barra u ħassu dahru mal-ħajt tant li baqa’ jagħti lil Mario Degiorgio dak li kien jitolbu għax ħassu rikattat.
L-Ispettur Lianne Bonello, li qed tmexxi l-prosekuzzjoni, ukoll xehdet fejn qalet li Theuma stqarr magħha li kien baqa’ jgħaddi flus lil Mario Degiorgio għax beża’ li jiġi tradut.
Hija semmiet kif Theuma qalilha li Mario Degiorgio kien jieħu flus għalih ukoll u bihom xtara kelb tar-razza Chow Chow miċ-Ċina għal €5,000.
L-Ispettur Bonello qalet li hemm 3 depożiti tal-banek li juru li Mario Degiorgio bagħat flus iċ-Ċina għal dan il-eb u li għadda €25,000 lil ħutu fil-ħabs.
Hija żiedet li waqt tfittxija fid-dar ta’ Mario Degiorgio, li ilu ma jaħdem mill-2004, sabu €8,050 fi flus kontant, iċ-ċertifikat tal-pedigree tal-kelb u għadd ta’ CDs li għad mhux magħruf x’fihom.

Il-prosekuzzjoni qed titmexxa’ wkoll mill-Ispettur Christopher Ellul u mill-Avukati Francesco Refalo u Marthese Grech mill-Uffiċċju tal-Avukat Ġenerali waqt li l-Avukati William Cuschieri u Lennox Vella qed jiddefendu lil Mario Degiorgio.
Ara wkoll:

transcript eng.Title: Melvin Theuma testifies that he passed on money to Mario Degiorgio because he felt threatened

Transcript.text: Melvin Theuma said he handed over money to Mario Degiorgio for him to pass on to his brothers George and Alfred Degiorgio in prison, because he felt threatened.
Theuma was testifying before Magistrate Donatella Frendo Dimech during the criminal inquiry of Mario Degiorgio who has been charged with money laundering and blackmail.
Degiorgio is the brother of the two men who are charged with the murder of Daphne Caruana Galizia and is currently in prison as are his brothers.

Theuma was granted a presidential pardon in connection with the murder in which Yorgen Fenech stands accused of complicity while Vince Muscat is serving a 15-year prison sentence after admitting his involvement in the murder.
In today’s testimony Theuma claimed that he never told Mario Degiorgio that he was the middleman in the murder of Caruana Galizia and never mentioned Yorgen Fenech.

He said that Mario Degiorgio used to ask him for money to cover George Degiorgio’s expenses, including those related to school fees, and he used to meet the accused in a car in Marsa or at Mario Degiorgio’s house in the same locality.
Theuma said that he sometimes passed on €200 a week of his own money for the brothers George and Alfred Degiorgio apart from the €2,500 that Yorgen Fenech had given him for them.
He added that Mario Degiorgio used to hand him receipts issued by the Corradino Correctional Facility, some of which he used to hand over to Yorgen Fenech as proof that the money had been passed on.

Theuma claimed that George Degiorgio used to tell him to be afraid of the people on the inside and he felt that his back was against the wall so much that he kept giving Mario Degiorgio what he was asking for because he felt blackmailed.
Inspector Lianne Bonello, who is leading the prosecution, also testified and said that Theuma had told her that he had kept passing money to Mario Degiorgio because he was afraid of being betrayed.
She mentioned that Theuma told her that Mario Degiorgio used to take money for himself and had bought a Chow Chow breed dog from China for €5,000.
Inspector Bonello said that there are 3 bank deposits that show that Mario Degiorgio sent money to China for this crime and that he passed €25,000 to his brothers in prison.

She added that a search of Mario Degiorgio’s house, who has been unemployed since 2004, yielded €8,050 in cash, the dog’s pedigree certificate and a number of CDs, the contents of which have not yet been identified.

Inspector Christopher Ellul and Dr Francesco Refalo and Dr Marthese Grech from the Attorney General’s Office are prosecuting, while Dr William Cuschieri and Dr Lennox Vella are defending Mario Degiorgio.
See Also:

transcript mlt.Title: Spetturi tas-sajd tal-UE mil-lum jibdew spezzjonijiet barra l-ibħra Maltin

Transcript.text: Spetturi tas-sajd tal-Unjoni Ewropea, fosthom spetturi Maltin, huma parti mill-ekwipaġġ tal-lanċa Lundy Sentinel li mil-lum se jibda l-ispezzjonijiet tas-sajd tal-ibħra barra ż-żona Maltija.
Għall-ewwel darba l-Lundy Sentinel daħlet Malta biex minn hawn titlaq għall-ispezzjonijiet fuq is-sajd tal-lampuki hekk kif beda x-xahar t’Awwissu.

Il-Lundy Sentinel hija lanċa tal-Aġenzija Ewropea għall-kontroll tas-sajd li tagħmel spezzjonijiet fuq bastimenti tas-sajd kemm Ewropej u dawk li mhumiex f’diversi ibħra fosthom fl-Atlantiku l-Mediterran.
Wara ħidma ta’ 3 snin Malta rnexxielha ġġib lejn il-Mediterran il-lanċa Lundy Sentinel – patrol vessel tal-Aġenzija Ewropea għall-Kontroll tas-Sajd (EFCA).

Din il-lanċa qed terġa’ topera fil-Mediterran biex tagħmel spezzjonijiet fuq bastimenti tas-sajd. Waqt l-ispezzjonijiet isiru kontrolli f’żoni speċifiċi bħal Sqallija fi staġuni differenti fosthom għat-tonn, pixxispad u lampuki.
Id-Direttur tad-Dipartiment tas-Sajd, Gilbert Balzan, qal lil TVMnews li l-ispezzjonijiet mhux se jieqfu biss fl-ibħra tal-Unjoni Ewropea.
Il-bastiment itajjar ukoll il-bandiera tal GFCM li b’hekk turi wkoll li ċertu spezzjonijiet jistgħu jsiru fuq dawn il-pajjiżi kollha bħal Tuneżini, Libjani u bastimenti oħrajn.
Transcript.author: Gilbert Balzan

Transcript.text: Spetturi Maltin huma parti mill-ekwipaġġ biex jissaħħaħ il-monitoraġġ tal-ibħra Maltin bejn it-12 u l-25 mil u lis-sajjieda barra ż-żona Maltija.
Is-Segretarju Parlamentari għas-Sajd u l-Akwakultura, Alicia Bugeja Said, qalet li waħda mill-akbar problemi li jaffaċċjaw is-sajjieda Maltin hija meta jibda l-istaġun tal-lampuki.

Minħabba l-fatt li rajna sena wara l-oħra t-Tuneżini jistadu fuq iċ-ċimi tal-Maltin, b’dan il-mod aħna naraw li l-liġi li qiegħda hemm għall-Maltin kif ukoll għal dawn il-pajjiżi li mhumiex fl-Unjoni Ewropea jridu wkoll ikunu konformi ma’ dawn il-liġijiet.
Transcript.author: Alicia Bugeja Said

Transcript.text: Min ma josservax ir-regoli, l-Aġenzija Ewropea għall-Kontroll tas-Sajd għandha jedd tmexxi r-rapporti neċessarji biex jinħargu multi u jekk ikun il-każ il-bastimenti jew dgħajjes li jinqabdu jiksru l-liġi jistgħu jitpoġġew fuq il-lista s-sewda jekk jibqgħu jirrepetu l-istess ksur.
Jean Paul Cesare, sajjied Malti, iħares lejn dan il-monitoraġġ bħala wieħed bżonnjuż.

Dan il-bastiment se jissalvagwardja lis-sajjieda u jistgħu jserrħu naqra rashom milli jkollhom dik il-problema jmorru biex jaqilgħu l-għajxien tagħhom u jsibu l-kannizzati midjurin diġà, naraw din is-sena bil-bastiment tal-Ewropa ma jkunx hawn dik il-problema li sajjied imur x’jaqla’ x’jiekol u jsib il-problema tat-Tuneżini.
Transcript.author: Jean Paul Cesare – sajjied

Transcript.text: Il-Lundy Setinal mistennija tiġi Malta darba fis-sena.

Imwaqqfa fl-2005 l-Aġenzija Ewropea għall-Kontroll tas-Sajd hija responsabbli mill-kordinazzjoni fuq il-kontroll tas-sajd u tgħin lis-sajjieda fil-pajjiżi membri tal-Unjoni Ewropea jimxu iżjed mar-regoli Ewropej.

transcript eng.Title: EU fisheries inspectors begin inspections outside of Maltese waters on EFCA vessel

Transcript.text: European Union fisheries inspectors, including Maltese inspectors, form part of the Lundy Sentinel ferry crew, set to start fishing inspections of waters outside the Maltese zone, starting today.
The Lundy Sentinel entered Malta for the first time and is expected to depart for inspections in connection with the fishing of lampuki, now that the month of August has begun.

The Lundy Sentinel is ferry rented by the European Fisheries Control Agency that carries out inspections on both European and non-European fishing vessels in various seas including the Atlantic and the Mediterranean.
After 3 years of work, Malta managed to bring the patrol vessel to the Mediterranean.

This ferry is once again operating in the Mediterranean to carry out inspections on fishing vessels. During the inspections checks are carried out in specific areas such as Sicily, in different seasons, for tuna, swordfish and lampuki among others.
The Director of the Fisheries Department, Gilbert Balzan, told TVMnews that the inspections will not be limited to the waters of the European Union.
The ship also flies the GFCM flag which also indicates that certain inspections can be carried out on all countries indicated such as Tunisians, Libyans and other ships.
Transcript.author: Gilbert Balzan

Transcript.text: Maltese inspectors are part of the crew to strengthen the monitoring of Maltese waters between an area of 12 and 25 miles, and of fishermen outside the Maltese zone.
The Parliamentary Secretary for Fisheries and Aquaculture, Alicia Bugeja Said, said that the lampuki season posed one of the biggest problems for Maltese fishermen.

Year after year we have observed the Tunisians fishing on Maltese nets, so we try to ensure that the law which applies to the Maltese, also applies to these countries that are not in the European Union.
Transcript.author: Alicia Bugeja Said

Transcript.text: The European Fisheries Control Agency has the right to issue the necessary reports and to issue fines in respect of those who do not observe the rules. Vessels or boats that are caught breaking the law can be placed on the blacklist if they keep repeating the same violation.
Jean Paul Cesare, Maltese fisherman regards the monitoring as necessary

This vessel will safeguard the fishermen and they can rest assured that they won’t face problems when they try to earn an honest living. This year as a result of the European ship there won’t be that problem – i.e. Maltese fisherman facing problems with the Tunisians.
Transcript.author: Jean Paul Cesare – fisherman

Transcript.text: The Lundy Setinel is expected to come to Malta once a year.

Established in 2005, the European Agency for Fisheries Control is responsible for coordinating fisheries control and helps fishermen in the member countries of the European Union become more compliant with European rules.
